snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar news. The weekend's selection includes items on GChat as a word and why we love geeky glasses.
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar news. The weekend's selection includes items on GChat as a word and why we love geeky glasses.
lead_paragraph: Here are the interesting and sometimes peculiar things that the tech reporters and editors for The New York Times found on the Web. Find more Scuttlebot items here.

headline.main: Weekend Scuttlebot: GChat and Geeky Glasses
